User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Edoxia-TCG application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

registrationDate.description: The date and time the user registered.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

favoriteCardId.description: The ID of the user's favorite card from their collection.

UserCard.title: User Card
UserCard.description: Represents a card in a user's collection, linking a user to a card.

cardId.description: The ID of the card from the global card list.

acquiredAt.description: The date and time the user acquired the card.

definition.description: Stores user data. Path-based ownership ensures only the authenticated user can access their own data.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.  Matches the Firebase Auth UID.

definition.description: Stores a card in a user's collection. The document ID should match the card's main ID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The UID of the user who owns the card.

params.name: cardId
params.description: The unique ID of the card.

firestore.reasoning: This Firestore structure prioritizes security by nesting user-specific data (like their card collection) under their user document. This enables simple and effective path-based security rules. The user's card collection is stored in a subcollection under their user document, which allows for efficient querying and strong security rules based on the path.
